trans-unit.source: 'disabled' - The initial navigation is not performed. The location listener is set up before the root component gets created. Use if there is a reason to have more control over when the router starts its initial navigation due to some complex initialization logic.
trans-unit.target: 'disabled'-不执行初始导航。位置侦听器是在创建根组件之前设置的。如果由于某种复杂的初始化逻辑，有理由对路由器何时开始其初始导航有更多的控制权，请使用。

trans-unit.source: 'disabled'- (Default) Does nothing. Scroll position is maintained on navigation.
trans-unit.target: 'disabled'-（默认）不执行任何操作。滚动位置在导航上保持不变。

trans-unit.source: 'enabled' - The initial navigation starts before the root component is created. The bootstrap is blocked until the initial navigation is complete. This value is required for server-side rendering to work.
trans-unit.target: 'enabled'-初始导航在创建根组件之前开始。引导程序将被阻止，直到完成初始导航为止。该值是服务器端渲染正常工作所必需的。

trans-unit.source: 'enabled'- Restores the previous scroll position on backward navigation, else sets the position to the anchor if one is provided, or sets the scroll position to [0, 0] (forward navigation). This option will be the default in the future.
trans-unit.target: 'enabled'-在向后导航时恢复上一个滚动位置，如果提供了导航，则将位置设置为锚点，或者将滚动位置设置为[0，0]（正向导航）。此选项将是将来的默认选项。

trans-unit.source: 'legacy_disabled'- The initial navigation is not performed. The location listener is set up after the root component gets created. @deprecated since v4
trans-unit.target: 'legacy_disabled'-不执行初始导航。在创建根组件之后，将设置位置侦听器。自v4起已弃用

trans-unit.source: 'legacy_enabled'- (Default, for compatibility.) The initial navigation starts after the root component has been created. The bootstrap is not blocked until the initial navigation is complete. @deprecated
trans-unit.target: 'legacy_enabled'-（默认值，出于兼容性考虑。）在创建根组件之后开始初始导航。在完成初始导航之前，引导程序不会被阻止。@已弃用

trans-unit.source: 'top'- Sets the scroll position to x = 0, y = 0 on all navigation.
trans-unit.target: 'top'-在所有导航上将滚动位置设置为x = 0，y = 0。

trans-unit.source: APP_BOOTSTRAP_LISTENER: Callback is invoked for each component that is bootstrapped. The handler function receives the ComponentRef instance of the bootstrapped component.
trans-unit.target: APP_BOOTSTRAP_LISTENER：为每个引导的组件调用回调。处理程序函数接收自举组件的ComponentRef实例。

trans-unit.source: APP_INITIALIZER: Callback is invoked before an app is initialized. All registered initializers can optionally return a Promise. All initializer functions that return Promises must be resolved before the application is bootstrapped. If one of the initializers fails to resolves, the application is not bootstrapped.
trans-unit.target: APP_INITIALIZER：在初始化应用程序之前将调用回调。所有注册的初始化程序都可以有选择地返回Promise。在引导应用程序之前，必须解决所有返回Promises的初始化函数。如果初始化程序之一无法解析，则不会引导应用程序。

trans-unit.source: PLATFORM_INITIALIZER: Callback is invoked when a platform is initialized.
trans-unit.target: PLATFORM_INITIALIZER：初始化平台后将调用回调。

trans-unit.source: String.raw() is a tag function native to JavaScript ES2015.

trans-unit.source: Custom elements are a Web Platform feature currently supported by Chrome, Firefox, Opera, and Safari, and available in other browsers through polyfills (see Browser Support). A custom element extends HTML by allowing you to define a tag whose content is created and controlled by JavaScript code. The browser maintains a CustomElementRegistry of defined custom elements, which maps an instantiable JavaScript class to an HTML tag.
trans-unit.target: 自定义元素是Chrome，Firefox，Opera和Safari当前支持的Web平台功能，并且可以通过polyfill在其他浏览器中使用（请参见浏览器支持）。自定义元素通过允许您定义其内容由JavaScript代码创建和控制的标记来扩展HTML。浏览器维护定义的自定义元素的 CustomElementRegistry ，该元素将可实例化的JavaScript类映射到HTML标记。

trans-unit.source: Cross-Site Request Forgery (XSRF) is an attack technique by which the attacker can trick an authenticated user into unknowingly executing actions on your website. HttpClient supports a common mechanism used to prevent XSRF attacks. When performing HTTP requests, an interceptor reads a token from a cookie, by default XSRF-TOKEN, and sets it as an HTTP header, X-XSRF-TOKEN. Since only code that runs on your domain could read the cookie, the backend can be certain that the HTTP request came from your client application and not an attacker.
trans-unit.target: 跨站点请求伪造（XSRF）是一种攻击技术，攻击者可利用该技术诱使经过身份验证的用户在不知不觉中对您的网站执行操作。 HttpClient 支持用于防止XSRF攻击的通用机制。执行HTTP请求时，拦截器默认从 XSRF-TOKEN 从cookie读取令牌，并将其设置为HTTP标头 X-XSRF-TOKEN 。由于只有在您的域上运行的代码才能读取Cookie，因此后端可以确定HTTP请求来自您的客户端应用程序而不是攻击者。

trans-unit.source: Cross-site scripting (XSS) enables attackers to inject malicious code into web pages. Such code can then, for example, steal user data (in particular, login data) or perform actions to impersonate the user. This is one of the most common attacks on the web.
trans-unit.target: 跨站点脚本（XSS）使攻击者能够将恶意代码注入网页。这样的代码然后可以例如窃取用户数据（特别是登录数据）或执行模仿用户的操作。这是网络上最常见的攻击之一。

trans-unit.source: Important: The characters .,0# (and others below) are special placeholders that stand for the decimal separator, and so on, and are NOT real characters. You must NOT "translate" the placeholders. For example, don't change . to , even though in your language the decimal point is written with a comma. The symbols should be replaced by the local equivalents, using the appropriate NumberSymbol for your language.
trans-unit.target: 重要提示：字符 . , 0 # （及下面的其他字符）是特殊的占位符，代表小数点分隔符，依此类推，不是真正的字符。您不得“翻译”占位符。例如，不要更改 . 到 , 即使在您的语言中，小数点也是用逗号写的。应使用适合您语言的 NumberSymbol ，将这些符号替换为本地等效符号。

trans-unit.source: #name="ngModel" exports NgModel into a local variable called name. NgModel mirrors many of the properties of its underlying FormControl instance, so you can use this in the template to check for control states such as valid and dirty. For a full list of control properties, see the AbstractControl API reference.
trans-unit.target: #name="ngModel" 将 NgModel 导出到名为 name 的局部变量中。 NgModel 镜像了其基础 FormControl 实例的许多属性，因此您可以在模板中使用它来检查控件状态，例如 valid 和 dirty 。有关控件属性的完整列表，请参见AbstractControl API参考。

trans-unit.source: NgIf is the simplest structural directive and the easiest to understand. It takes a boolean expression and makes an entire chunk of the DOM appear or disappear.

trans-unit.source: NgIf works differently. When NgIf is false, Angular removes the element and its descendants from the DOM. It destroys their components, freeing up resources, which results in a better user experience.
trans-unit.target: NgIf 的工作方式有所不同。如果 NgIf 为 false ，则Angular将从DOM中删除该元素及其后代。它破坏了它们的组件，释放了资源，从而带来了更好的用户体验。

trans-unit.source: NgSwitch is actually a set of three, cooperating directives: NgSwitch, NgSwitchCase, and NgSwitchDefault as in the following example.
trans-unit.target: NgSwitch 实际上是三个协作指令的集合： NgSwitch ， NgSwitchCase 和 NgSwitchDefault ,如以下示例所示。

trans-unit.source: NgSwitch is the controller directive. Bind it to an expression that returns the switch value, such as feature. Though the feature value in this example is a string, the switch value can be of any type.
trans-unit.target: NgSwitch 是控制器指令。将其绑定到返回开关值的表达式，例如 feature 。尽管此示例中的 feature 值是字符串，但开关值可以是任何类型。

trans-unit.source: NgSwitch itself is not a structural directive. It's an attribute directive that controls the behavior of the other two switch directives. That's why you write [ngSwitch], never *ngSwitch.
trans-unit.target: NgSwitch 本身不是结构指令。这是一个属性指令，用于控制其他两个switch指令的行为。这就是为什么您编写 [ngSwitch] 而不要 *ngSwitch 的原因。

trans-unit.source: NgSwitchCase adds its element to the DOM when its bound value equals the switch value and removes its bound value when it doesn't equal the switch value.
trans-unit.target: NgSwitchCase 的绑定值等于开关值时，将其元素添加到DOM中；当它的绑定值等于开关值时，将其元素移除到DOM。

trans-unit.source: NgSwitchCase and NgSwitchDefaultare structural directives. You attach them to elements using the asterisk (*) prefix notation. An NgSwitchCase displays its host element when its value matches the switch value. The NgSwitchDefault displays its host element when no sibling NgSwitchCase matches the switch value.
trans-unit.target: NgSwitchCase 和 NgSwitchDefault 是结构指令。您可以使用星号（*）前缀表示法将它们附加到元素上。一个 NgSwitchCase 显示其主机元件当其值在开关值匹配。当没有同级 NgSwitchCase 与开关值匹配时， NgSwitchDefault 将显示其主机元素。

trans-unit.source: NgSwitchDefault adds its element to the DOM when there is no selected NgSwitchCase.
trans-unit.target: NgSwitchDefault 当没有选择 NgSwitchCase 时， NgSwitchDefault将其元素添加到DOM中。

trans-unit.source: FormArray is an alternative to FormGroup for managing any number of unnamed controls. As with form group instances, you can dynamically insert and remove controls from form array instances, and the form array instance value and validation status is calculated from its child controls. However, you don't need to define a key for each control by name, so this is a great option if you don't know the number of child values in advance. The following example shows you how to manage an array of aliases in ProfileEditor.
trans-unit.target: FormArray 是一个替代 FormGroup 用于管理任何数量的未命名的控件。与表单组实例一样，您可以动态地从表单数组实例中插入和删除控件，并且表单数组实例的值和验证状态是从其子控件中计算出来的。但是，您不需要按名称为每个控件定义键，因此，如果您事先不知道子值的数量，这是一个不错的选择。以下示例显示了如何在 ProfileEditor 中管理别名数组。

trans-unit.source: FormArray tracks the same values and status for an array of form controls.

trans-unit.source: downgradeModule(), on the other side, avoids explicitly triggering change detection unless it knows the other part of the app is interested in the changes. Thus, downgradeComponent() automatically triggers change detection on that component.

trans-unit.source: downgradeModule() returns the name of the created AngularJS wrapper module. You can use it to declare a dependency in your main AngularJS module.

trans-unit.source: downgradeModule(), on the other side, does not try to tie the two change detection systems as tightly, restricting the explicit change detection runs only to cases where it knows it is necessary (e.g. when the inputs of a downgraded component change). This improves performance, especially in change-detection-heavy applications, but leaves it up to the developer to manually notify each framework as needed.
trans-unit.target: downgradeModule() 另一方面， downgradeModule（）并没有试图将两个变更检测系统紧密地联系在一起，而是将显式变更检测运行仅限于它知道有必要的情况下（例如，当降级的组件的输入发生更改时）。这可以提高性能，尤其是在大量检测变化的应用程序中，但是让开发人员可以根据需要手动通知每个框架。

trans-unit.source: PlatformLocation encapsulates all calls to DOM apis, which allows the Router to be platform agnostic. This means that we can have different implementation of PlatformLocation for the different platforms that angular supports. For example, @angular/platform-browser provides an implementation specific to the browser environment, while @angular/platform-webworker provides one suitable for use with web workers.
trans-unit.target: PlatformLocation 封装了对DOM api的所有调用，这使路由器可以与平台无关。这意味着我们可以为角度支持的不同平台使用不同的 PlatformLocation 实现。例如， @angular/platform-browser 提供了特定于浏览器环境的实现，而 @angular/platform-webworker 提供了适合与Web Worker一起使用的实现。

trans-unit.source: @Input() and @Output() act as the API, or application programming interface, of the child component in that they allow the child to communicate with the parent. Think of @Input() and @Output() like ports or doorways—@Input() is the doorway into the component allowing data to flow in while @Output() is the doorway out of the component, allowing the child component to send data out.
trans-unit.target: @Input() 和 @Output() 充当子组件的API或应用程序编程接口，因为它们允许子组件与父组件进行通信。想到 @Input() 和 @Output() 像端口或doorways- @Input() 是门口到组件允许数据在流动，同时 @Output() 是门口出部件的，允许子组件可以发送数据输出。

trans-unit.source: @Input() and @Output() allow Angular to share data between the parent context and child directives or components. An @Input() property is writable while an @Output() property is observable.
trans-unit.target: @Input() 和 @Output() 允许Angular在父上下文和子指令或组件之间共享数据。一个 @Input() 属性是可写，而一个 @Output() 属性是可观察的。

trans-unit.source: @NgModule metadata tells the Angular compiler what components to compile for this module and how to link this module with other modules.
trans-unit.target: @NgModule 元数据告诉Angular编译器为此模块编译哪些组件，以及如何将该模块与其他模块链接。

trans-unit.source: @Optional() allows Angular to consider a service you inject to be optional. This way, if it can't be resolved at runtime, Angular simply resolves the service as null, rather than throwing an error. In the following example, the service, OptionalService, isn't provided in the service, @NgModule(), or component class, so it isn't available anywhere in the app.
trans-unit.target: @Optional() 允许Angular将您注入的服务视为可选服务。这样，如果无法在运行时解析它，Angular只会将服务解析为 null ，而不是抛出错误。在下面的示例中，服务， OptionalService ，在该服务没有提供， @NgModule() ，或组件类，所以它不是在应用可在任何地方。

trans-unit.source: @Output() marks a property in a child component as a doorway through which data can travel from the child to the parent. The child component then has to raise an event so the parent knows something has changed. To raise an event, @Output() works hand in hand with EventEmitter, which is a class in @angular/core that you use to emit custom events.
trans-unit.target: @Output() 将子组件中的属性标记为门口，数据可以通过该门从子组件传递到父组件。然后，子组件必须引发一个事件，以便父组件知道某些更改。要发起一个活动， @Output() 与 EventEmitter 配合使用， EventEmitter是 @angular/core 中的一个类，用于发出自定义事件。

trans-unit.source: @Output()—a decorator function marking the property as a way for data to go from the child to the parent
trans-unit.target: @Output() —装饰器函数，将属性标记为数据从子级到父级的一种方式

trans-unit.source: @SkipSelf() and viewProviders
trans-unit.target: @SkipSelf() 和 viewProviders

trans-unit.source: @SkipSelf() is the opposite of @Self(). With @SkipSelf(), Angular starts its search for a service in the parent ElementInjector, rather than in the current one. So if the parent ElementInjector were using the value 🌿 (fern) for emoji , but you had 🍁 (maple leaf) in the component's providers array, Angular would ignore 🍁 (maple leaf) and use 🌿 (fern).
trans-unit.target: @SkipSelf() 与 @Self() 相反。使用 @SkipSelf() ，Angular在父 ElementInjector 中而不是当前元素中开始搜索服务。因此，如果父 ElementInjector 对 emoji 使用值 🌿 （蕨），但是组件的 providers 数组中有 🍁 （枫叶），则Angular将忽略 🍁 （枫叶），而使用 🌿 （蕨）。

trans-unit.source: @SkipSelf() with @Optional()
trans-unit.target: @SkipSelf() 和 @Optional()

trans-unit.source: @SkipSelf(), causes the injector to start its search for the AnimalService at the <app-root>, not the <app-child>, where the request originates, and @Host() stops the search at the <app-root><#VIEW>. Since AnimalService is provided via the viewProviders array, the injector finds 🦔 (hedgehog) in the <#VIEW>.
trans-unit.target: @SkipSelf() 导致注入器在 <app-root> 而不是在请求发出的 <app-child> 处开始对 AnimalService 的搜索，并且 @Host() Host（）在 <app-root> 处停止搜索> <#VIEW> 。由于 AnimalService 是通过 viewProviders 数组提供的，因此注入程序会在 <#VIEW> 中找到🦔（刺猬）。

trans-unit.source: @SkipSelf is essential for two reasons:
trans-unit.target: @SkipSelf 之所以必不可少，有两个原因：

trans-unit.source: @angular/platform-webworker was introduced in Angular version 2 as an experiment in leveraging Angular's rendering architecture to run an entire web application in a web worker. We've learned a lot from this experiment and have come to the conclusion that running the entire application in a web worker is not the best strategy for most applications.
trans-unit.target: @angular/platform-webworker 是在Angular版本2中引入的，是利用Angular的渲染体系结构在Web Worker中运行整个Web应用程序的实验。我们从这个实验中学到了很多，得出的结论是，对于大多数应用程序来说，在Web worker中运行整个应用程序不是最佳策略。

trans-unit.source: @types/angular is declared as a UMD module, and due to the way UMD typings work, once you have an ES6 import statement in a file all UMD typed modules must also be imported via import statements instead of being globally available.
trans-unit.target: @types/angular 被声明为UMD模块，由于UMD输入的工作方式，一旦文件中有ES6 import 语句，所有UMD类型的模块也必须通过 import 语句导入，而不是全局可用。

trans-unit.source: AppComponent defines a method that can detect when a view changes. The method assigns an animation state value to the animation trigger (@routeAnimation) based on the route configuration data property value. Here's an example of an AppComponent method that detects when a route change happens.
trans-unit.target: AppComponent 定义了一种可以检测视图何时更改的方法。该方法基于路线配置 data 属性值将动画状态值分配给动画触发器（ @routeAnimation ）。这是一个 AppComponent 的示例方法方法检测何时发生路线更改。

trans-unit.source: EXISTING_CLIENTS_ONLY: the service worker does not have a clean copy of the latest known version of the app. Older cached versions are safe to use, so existing tabs continue to run from cache, but new loads of the app will be served from the network. The service worker will try to recover from this state when a new version of the application is detected and installed (that is, when a new ngsw.json is available).
trans-unit.target: EXISTING_CLIENTS_ONLY ：服务工作者没有应用程序最新已知版本的完整副本。较早的缓存版本可以安全使用，因此现有选项卡将继续从缓存中运行，但是将通过网络为应用提供新的负载。当检测到并安装了新版本的应用程序后（即有新的 ngsw.json 可用时），服务工作者将尝试从此状态中恢复。

trans-unit.source: Key is used internally by ReflectiveInjector because its system-wide unique id allows the injector to store created objects in a more efficient way.

trans-unit.source: ModuleInjector hierarchy—configure a ModuleInjector in this hierarchy using an @NgModule() or @Injectable() annotation.

trans-unit.source: ModuleInjector is configured by the @NgModule.providers and NgModule.imports property. ModuleInjector is a flattening of all of the providers arrays which can be reached by following the NgModule.imports recursively.
trans-unit.target: ModuleInjector 由 @NgModule.providers 和 NgModule.imports 属性配置。 ModuleInjector 是所有providers数组的扁平化，可以通过递归地遵循 NgModule.imports 来实现。

trans-unit.source: NORMAL indicates that the service worker is operating normally and is not in a degraded state.
trans-unit.target: NORMAL 表示服务工作者正在正常运行并且未处于降级状态。

trans-unit.source: NgFor is a repeater directive—a way to present a list of items. You define a block of HTML that defines how a single item should be displayed and then you tell Angular to use that block as a template for rendering each item in the list. The text assigned to *ngFor is the instruction that guides the repeater process.
trans-unit.target: NgFor 是转发器指令-一种显示项目列表的方法。您定义一个HTML块，该HTML块定义应如何显示单个项目，然后告诉Angular使用该块作为模板来呈现列表中的每个项目。分配给 *ngFor 的文本是指导中继器过程的指令。

trans-unit.source: NgFor is implemented by the NgForOf directive. Read more about the other NgForOf context values such as last, even, and odd in the NgForOf API reference.
trans-unit.target: NgFor 由 NgForOf 指令实现。在NgForOf API参考中阅读有关其他 NgForOf 上下文值的更多信息，例如 last ， even 和 odd 。

trans-unit.source: None means that Angular does no view encapsulation. Angular adds the CSS to the global styles. The scoping rules, isolations, and protections discussed earlier don't apply. This is essentially the same as pasting the component's styles into the HTML.
trans-unit.target: None 表示Angular不进行视图封装。Angular将CSS添加到全局样式中。前面讨论的范围规则，隔离和保护不适用。这本质上与将组件的样式粘贴到HTML中相同。

trans-unit.source: None: Do not provide any template or style encapsulation.
trans-unit.target: None ：不提供任何模板或样式封装。

trans-unit.source: Object - keys are CSS classes that get added when the expression given in the value evaluates to a truthy value, otherwise they are removed.
trans-unit.target: Object -键是CSS类，在值中给定的表达式计算为真实值时会添加，否则将被删除。

trans-unit.source: SAFE_MODE: the service worker cannot guarantee the safety of using cached data. Either an unexpected error occurred or all cached versions are invalid. All traffic will be served from the network, running as little service worker code as possible.
trans-unit.target: SAFE_MODE ：服务工作者无法保证使用缓存数据的安全性。发生意外错误或所有缓存的版本均无效。所有流量都将通过网络提供，并运行尽可能少的服务工作者代码。

trans-unit.source: VillainService is a singleton with respect to VillainsListComponent because that is where it is declared. As long as VillainsListComponent does not get destroyed it will be the same instance of VillainService but if there are multilple instances of VillainsListComponent, then each instance of VillainsListComponent will have its own instance of VillainService.

trans-unit.source: app.component.ts defines the app's root component, which uses the PopupService to add the pop-up to the DOM at run time. When the app runs, the root component's constructor converts PopupComponent to a custom element.
trans-unit.target: app.component.ts 定义了应用程序的根组件，该组件使用PopupService在运行时将弹出窗口添加到DOM。当应用程序运行时，根组件的构造函数将PopupComponent转换为自定义元素。

trans-unit.target: app.component.ts —用TypeScript编写的组件类代码。

trans-unit.source: app.module.ts adds the PopupComponent in the module's entryComponents list, to exclude it from compilation and avoid startup warnings or errors.
trans-unit.target: app.module.ts 将PopupComponent添加到模块的 entryComponents 列表中，以将其从编译中排除，并避免启动警告或错误。

trans-unit.source: app.module.ts defines the application's root module. In it you identify the external modules you'll use in the application and declare the components that belong to this module, such as the HeroFormComponent.
trans-unit.target: app.module.ts 定义应用程序的根模块。在其中，您可以确定将在应用程序中使用的外部模块，并声明属于该模块的组件，例如 HeroFormComponent 。

trans-unit.source: lazy does not cache any of the resources up front. Instead, the Angular service worker only caches resources for which it receives requests. This is an on-demand caching mode. Resources that are never requested will not be cached. This is useful for things like images at different resolutions, so the service worker only caches the correct assets for the particular screen and orientation.
trans-unit.target: lazy 不会预先缓存任何资源。相反，Angular服务工作者仅缓存其接收请求的资源。这是按需缓存模式。从未请求的资源将不会被缓存。这对于诸如不同分辨率的图像之类的东西很有用，因此服务工作者仅针对特定的屏幕和方向缓存正确的资产。

trans-unit.source: lazy tells the service worker to not cache those resources. Instead, it treats them as unrequested and waits until they're requested again before updating them. An updateMode of lazy is only valid if the installMode is also lazy.

trans-unit.source: switchMap() calls the search service for each search term that makes it through debounce() and distinctUntilChanged(). It cancels and discards previous search observables, returning only the latest search service observable.
trans-unit.target: switchMap() 通过 debounce() 和 distinctUntilChanged() 为每个搜索词调用搜索服务。它取消并丢弃以前的搜索可观察值，仅返回最新的可观察的搜索服务。

trans-unit.source: switchMap() preserves the original request order while returning only the observable from the most recent HTTP method call. Results from prior calls are canceled and discarded.
trans-unit.target: switchMap() 保留原始请求顺序，同时仅从最近的HTTP方法调用返回可观察到的内容。先前呼叫的结果将被取消并丢弃。

trans-unit.target: templateUrl ：此组件的HTML模板的模块相对地址。或者，您可以内联HTML模板，作为 template 属性的值。该模板定义了组件的宿主视图。

trans-unit.source: templateUrl: supported.
trans-unit.target: templateUrl ：受支持。

trans-unit.source: terminal: ignored.
trans-unit.target: terminal ：被忽略。

trans-unit.source: title- the text displayed in the side nav.

trans-unit.target: transclude ：受支持。

trans-unit.target: u ：毫秒

trans-unit.source: unknown: The current value of the history.state object.
trans-unit.target: unknown ： history.state 对象的当前值。

trans-unit.source: updateOn: The event upon which the control should be updated (options: 'change' | 'blur' | submit')
trans-unit.target: updateOn ：控件应在其上更新的事件（选项：“更改” |“模糊” |提交）

trans-unit.source: url- the URL of the guide page (item node only).
trans-unit.target: url -指南页面的URL（仅适用于item节点）。

trans-unit.source: urls includes both URLs and URL patterns that will be matched at runtime. These resources are not fetched directly and do not have content hashes, but they will be cached according to their HTTP headers. This is most useful for CDNs such as the Google Fonts service. (Negative glob patterns are not supported and ? will be matched literally; i.e. it will not match any character other than ?.)
trans-unit.target: urls 包括将在运行时匹配的URL和URL模式。这些资源不会直接获取并且没有内容哈希，但是将根据其HTTP标头进行缓存。这对于CDN（例如Google字体服务）最有用。（不支持负的glob模式，并且 ? 将在字面上进行匹配；即，它将不匹配 ? 以外的任何字符。）

trans-unit.source: validator: A synchronous validator function, or an array of validator functions
trans-unit.target: validator ：同步验证器函数或验证器函数数组

trans-unit.source: version is an integer field and defaults to 1.
trans-unit.target: version 是一个整数字段，默认为 1 。

trans-unit.source: version provides a mechanism to indicate that the resources being cached have been updated in a backwards-incompatible way, and that the old cache entries—those from previous versions—should be discarded.
trans-unit.target: version 提供了一种机制，该机制指示已以向后不兼容的方式更新了正在缓存的资源，并且应丢弃旧的缓存项（来自先前版本的缓存项）。

trans-unit.source: version: The configuration-file version.
trans-unit.target: version ：配置文件版本。

trans-unit.source: versionedFiles has been deprecated. As of v6 versionedFiles and files options have the same behavior. Use files instead.
trans-unit.target: versionedFiles 已弃用。从v6 versionedFiles ，versionedFiles和 files 选项具有相同的行为。请改用 files 。

trans-unit.source: versionedFiles setting
trans-unit.target: versionedFiles 设置

trans-unit.source: void You can associate styles with this name to be used when the element is detached from the application. For example, when an ngIf evaluates to false, the state of the associated element is void.
trans-unit.target: void 您可以将样式与此名称关联，以便在元素与应用程序分离时使用。例如，当 ngIf 的值为false时，关联元素的状态为void。

trans-unit.source: void: Nothing.
trans-unit.target: void ：一无所有。

trans-unit.source: warnOnDeprecatedNgFormSelector Configures when to emit a warning when the deprecated ngForm selector is used.
trans-unit.target: warnOnDeprecatedNgFormSelector 配置使用不推荐使用的 ngForm 选择器时何时发出警告。

trans-unit.source: warnOnNgModelWithFormControl Configures when to emit a warning when an ngModel binding is used with reactive form directives.
trans-unit.target: warnOnNgModelWithFormControl 配置 ngModel 绑定与反应形式指令一起使用时何时发出警告。

trans-unit.source: yarn docs-watch --watch-only — watches for saved content changes and refreshes the browser. The (optional) --watch-only flag skips the initial docs rebuild.
trans-unit.target: yarn docs-watch --watch-only 保存的内容是否更改并刷新浏览器。（可选）-- --watch-only 标志跳过初始文档重建。

trans-unit.source: yarn setup — installs packages; builds docs, stackblitz, and zips.
trans-unit.target: yarn setup —安装卷装；构建文档，stackblitz和zip。
